Module Milestone1
Package app

Class StoreFront

  • java.lang.Object
    • app.StoreFront
  • public class StoreFront
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the Store Front, managing Inventory and Shopping Cart.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      StoreFront()
      Constructs a new StoreFront with empty inventory and cart.

      • purchase

        public void purchase​(java.lang.String productName,
                     int qty)
        Purchases the specified quantity of product. Updates inventory and cart quantities accordingly.
        Parameters:
        productName - Name of the product to purchase
        qty - Quantity to purchase
